My fellow Earthicans, as I have explained in my book 'Earth in the Balance'', 
and the much more popular ''Harry Potter and the Balance of Earth', we need to defend our planet 
against pollution. Also dark wizards. Tell her you just want to talk. 
It has nothing to do with mating.
